channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s NATO warning pushes Europe to face the cost of defending itself
item.description: Trump's NATO challenges push European defense spending pledges, but analysts say continent still lacks command experience to operate independently.
